scripts.dist: npm run copy & npm run webpack
scripts.installbabel: npm cache clean --force & cnpm i --save-dev babel-core babel-loader babel-polyfill babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-react babel-preset-stage-0
scripts.install: npm cache clean --force & cnpm i --save-dev copyfiles@2 webpack webpack-cli webpack-dev-server & cnpm i --save-dev style-loader css-loader stylus-loader stylus & cnpm i --save-dev file-loader & cnpm i --save-dev react-hot-loader@3 & cnpm i --save react react-dom history react-router react-router-dom redux react-redux axios antd md5 & cnpm i --save-dev uglifyjs-webpack-plugin webpack-body-parser html-webpack-plugin
